titles: Verses, presented to his masters in the ward of St. Giles's Cripplegate, within the Freedom. / By William Briscoe, bell-man.
author: Briscoe, William.
date: Printed Decemb. the 24th, in the year M.DC.LX.VII. [1667]
notes: Verse: "Christmass is come; The great Cathedral Feast ..."
